import React from 'react' import styles from './Testimonial.module.css' import Testicard from '../../Components/Testicard/Testicard' const data = [{ name:"Saumya Sinha", role:"Red Hat", img:"", desc:"", twitter:"", linkedin:"" }] const Testimonial = () => { return (
SAY'S
Experience Our Excellence
Through Testimonials
{data.map((e)=>)}
) } export default Testimonial
